Package org.springframework.core.convert

Type conversion system API.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConversionService
    A service interface for type conversion.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Property
    A description of a JavaBeans Property that allows us to avoid a dependency on java.beans.PropertyDescriptor.
    TypeDescriptor
    Context about a type to convert from or to.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConversionException
    Base class for exceptions thrown by the conversion system.
    ConversionFailedException
    Exception to be thrown when an actual type conversion attempt fails.
    ConverterNotFoundException
    Thrown when a suitable converter could not be found in a conversion service.

Package org.springframework.core.convert Description

Type conversion system API.
